mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_user (user_id, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_age) Values (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail} ,#{userGender}, #{userAge})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_age from m_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT i.user_num, i.movie_num, i.movie_img_num, i.movie_title FROM m_interest i JOIN m_movie m ON i.movie_img_num = m.movie_img_num AND i.movie_title = m.movie_title WHERE i.user_num = #{userNum} AND m.movie_num = #{movieNum}
SELECT user_num, rate_num, movie_num, rate_review , rate_score, rate_date, rate_like FROM m_rate WHERE user_num = #{userNum}

SELECT m_user.user_num, m_user.user_id, m_user.user_point, m_user.user_grade, m_movie.movie_num, m_movie.movie_title, m_rate.rate_review FROM m_user JOIN m_rate ON m_user.user_num = m_rate.user_num AND m_movie ON m_rate.movie_num = m_movie.movie_num
